snippet: At Café Carlyle, Clint Holmes acts out songs by Paul Simon and Cole Porter with the sweaty intensity of a man flirting with an emotional breakdown.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by Clint Holmes, singing the songs of Cole Porter and Paul Simon, at Cafe Carlyle.
lead_paragraph: At Café Carlyle, Clint Holmes acts out songs by Paul Simon and Cole Porter with the sweaty intensity of a man flirting with an emotional breakdown.

headline.seo: Clint Holmes Sings Simon and Porter at the Café Carlyle
headline.main: Intense Swings of Whimsy and Romance
headline.print_headline: Intense Swings of Whimsy and Romance
